rport.desc: Port to scan on chosen IPs

meth.desc: Type of SIP packets to do the requests ('random' supported)

lhost.desc: Source host (IP) to include in the  SIP request ('random' supported)

lport.desc: Source port to include in the  SIP request ('real' and 'random' supported)

domain.desc: Domain to explore ('ip' to use the rhost here)
